title: Set up bmo@bmobot.ai as primary email account
description:
Set up Microsoft Graph API email access for bmo@bmobot.ai and make it the preferred email:
1. Create Graph API email helper script (like jmap.js but for M365)
2. Update email skill to use bmo@bmobot.ai as primary
3. Update scheduled email check to include M365 mailbox
4. Update knowledge/integrations docs
5. Update memory with preferred email
6. Send test email to Dave at dhurley@servos.io
7. Ping Dave on Telegram when done

actions.note: All 7 items done: created scripts/email/graph.js, updated email skill to dual-account with M365 primary, updated email-reminder.sh to check both accounts, created knowledge/integrations/microsoft-graph.md, updated memory with preferred email, sent test email from bmo@bmobot.ai to dhurley@servos.io, pinged Dave on Telegram.
